```{r}
# combine degree and degree frequencies into a dataframe
degree3 <- c(degree, degree2)
counts3 <- c(counts, counts2)
df <- tibble(degree = degree3, counts = counts3)
```

```{r da3018proj_degdist, fig.cap="Degree distribution", dev = 'png'}
# plot degree distribution
ggplot(data = df, aes(x = degree3, y = counts3)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "degree", y = "frequency") +
  ggsave("da3018proj_degdist.png")
```
